title: Let's Watch TV: Only Murders in the Building
description:
This week, Joe learns a lesson in being polite before he and Mama Fran watch the hit Hulu show Only Murders in the Building. The show is about a plucky group of podcasters who broadcast an amateur true crime podcast while they are trying to solve a murder that happens in their building, starring Martin Short, Steve Martin, and Selena Gomez.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
